timeline.author: rpdome

replies.bodyText: FB, thankfully declared a resource id for each of the edit text fields, however, google didn't. In this case, Google instead has a resource id assigned to parent outer level password box that contains a label for the inner password edit text field. The actual inner edit text field doesn't contain any resource id....hence we need to do this logic to find the actual element for the password field.
